evidence.claim: Orbit Telehealth utilizes AWS services such as Lambda and EC2 for serverless computing and hosting.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure data security in healthcare communications.
Orbit Telehealth supports HL7 FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
EDI X12 transaction sets are used for healthcare billing and claims processing within the Orbit system.
Real-time streaming of healthcare data is facilitated through AWS services like Kinesis.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA compliance and X12 EDI integration aligns with target ICP profiles.
matched_use_cases: API-based integration for real-time patient data exchange
